transcription: bishops virgins and even spotless infants were subjected to the disgrace of a public penance before they could be admitted to the communion of the donatists
bishops virgins and even spotless priests were subjected to the disgrace of a public clinic before they could be admitted to the communion of the bishops
bishops virgins and even spotless princes were subjected to the disgrace of a public tenant before they could be admitted to the communion of the dynasty
bishops virgins and even scotland kingsmen were subjected to disgrace as a public clinic before they could be admitted to the communion of the donators
bishops those in the communion spotless seats were subjected to the disgrace of a public senate before they could be admitted into communion at the banquets
bishops or even even satellite princes were subjected to the disgrace of a public payment before they could be admitted to the communion of the duchess
when this time there had been no reason to take any action it was necessary to withdraw from the public assembly before they could be admitted into the assembly
